chats: Ain't you kinda old to be playin' dress-up?
So, who're you tryin' to impress with that mask?
...This shit's hilarious.
Why're you so desperate?
...Yo, you can't just waltz around here like that.
You're violatin' the weapons code or whatever, man.
choices: Not if no one finds out.

chats: Hey man, why don't we stop this shit and go have fun somewhere?
Hell, I got all sorta girls lined up if you're into that.
Yo, look what you did!
You knocked me down, and now my goddamn watch is broken!
...Hey, dontcha got anything better to do?
Seriously, cosplaying in a place like this? Are you just really freakin' bored?
So is this the end?
I coulda been a star...
...Um, why're you goin' for me? Ain't there worse people out there?
What kinda guys piss you off?
...By the way, think you could take that mask off when we're talkin'?
It's pretty rude, man.
choices: Try and rip it off me.

chats: Ahhh, I'm starvin'! Hey, is this like one of those interrogations on TV...?
They always give the guy a katsudon! You got anything like that for me!?
...So uh, instead of killin' me, you started chattin' with me...
You tryin' to get somethin' from me?
...So, today's my b-day and one of my friends went n' reserved a table at a fancy joint for me.
It'd prolly be a big downer if the birthday boy didn't show to his party, sooo...
...Yo, look at me.
I know when I'm gettin' all sweaty. I'm glistenin', ain't I?
...So, can I ask you something? I'm not sure I get what's happenin' here.
Did I lose...?
Hey, you. What'd you do if I told you I knew I could win?
You'd have no idea I was about to use my ultimate move.
Hey, you doin' this just 'cause our eyes met or something?
That's wack, man. Maybe you should get your head checked out.
...Y'know if you think about it, I'm basically your senpai.
Just thinkin' about hierarchy... you should be showin' me a little more respect, shouldn't you?
So, you've gotta be feelin' good lookin' down on me...
How 'bout we have an interview? You're the winner, after all. I'll listen to whatever you gotta say.
...Um, this has been buggin' me for a while, but...
Is it me, or does something stink?
So... this battle between us  is gonna go down in history.
What're you gonna tell your kids about this shit?
Y'know, that mask is kinda makin' me uneasy...
What's gonna happen to me?
...Hey listen, I got a girl waitin' to be my bride when I get back home from this...
How 'bout you? You wanna get married someday?
Y'know, even tho we're in this situation now, I was totally  born under a lucky star.
I'm sure a miracle's gonna happen to me, right?
choices: I'd be jealous if it did.

chats: ...Look, I'm done for. There's no way I'm gettin' outta this.
Life's nothing but pain anyways. Just do whatever you want.
You just waltz into our territory, acting like you belong here...
...Who the blazes do  you think you are?
choices: I don't have to answer you.

chats: ...At any rate, I give up. Did my horoscope say today would be bad?
...It's fine. Do as you please.
Ah, if it's things you want, we  can have a discussion... but you are after the one I serve, right?
If so, then won't you overlook this? Let's make a deal...
You... This is how you treat an enemy who's faltered after you've totally defeated them, right?
But what if I ripped your body apart? ...What color blood would come pouring out?
All right, let's calm down and talk. Take a deep breath, and listen well...
What if I was a "human"? Then, what you're doing... Well, it'd be a criminal act!
...Ah, I wonder if this is it for me?
If I'd known things would turn out like this, I wish I had found the courage to ask that girl out...
Hmph, I wasn't really trying this time, you know?
Ah, it's a shame. If I'd taken this seriously from the start, I wouldn't be in this sorry state.
Won't you give me a moment? Are you not pointing that at the wrong person?
I'm not the one you should want to shoot...
I feel like I understand you a little. I've run into all sorts of people in this job, so...
The truth is... You're a good person, aren't you?
...I'm aware you're a minor, but it would be lovely to leisurely talk over drinks.
It's cliched, but we could chat about life... Ask each other things like what kind of girls we like...
...I'm going to be killed, no matter what, right? So, won't you allow me to ask something?
As far as you're concerned, what  kind of person was I to you?
...Do you have a moment? I was wondering if you could tell me something for future reference.
What was the cause of my defeat...?
...Hey, if it's not a bother, would you tell me something?
What did you want, coming all the way to a place like this?
I've been gravely misinformed. This was supposed to be an easy job, just threatening intruders...
I would never have accepted this task if I knew it would involve this sort of suffering.
...Oh, speaking of, you did a  bang-up job making it this far.
You didn't stray from the path or get lost?
...I'm just asking out of curiosity, but how are you feeling?
I mean, how does it feel to wave your gun at an enemy who's completely lost the will to fight?
...Hold on, it seems like you may have gotten the wrong idea...
I don't hate you. No, I don't feel that way at all...
...Huh? Wait a sec. What's that?
Did I just see your hand  shaking? Are you OK?
...Think of how I feel. A group of strangers appears, forcing  me to do whatever they want...
Doesn't what you're doing bother your conscience?
At any rate...  Why am I the only one this sort of thing happens to?
What did I do to deserve this?
You know, you really ought to leave me alone. I forgot to mention this, but...
I'm a man with a complicated  background. The people  I know, well...
...So? What do you plan on doing after this?
You do know that just pointing that at someone doesn't actually do anything, right? Buffoon.
Umm, you don't have a clue what you're doing, do you?
If your parents could see you now, I'm sure it would break their hearts...
...Very well. Let's say you beat me. Even so, you're not going to make it out of here unscathed.
And if that's the case, why don't you just stop this futile endeavor? It's meaningless...
...I wish to know the true  meaning of this behavior.
Do you seek friendly competition with a beloved neighbor? Or have you come to destroy a hated foe?
...You have already committed  a grave sin.
Do you not understand the  severity of your action?
That which you must do, it is not my murder...
It is to become aware of the  gaze of our Father who watches  over you with loving grace.
Even at this hour, our merciful Father may grant you forgiveness.
That power, vow that you will use it in the name of our Father.
...To behave in such a way, there must be something in this world that is troubling you.
...Very well. In the place  of our Father, I shall  listen to your complaints.
...I am under the protection of our magnificent Father.
Therefore, I cannot be destroyed. Desist from this pointlessness.
...I fear you may have gone astray. Our Father prays you return to the righteous path.
Confess your sins.
Know that your actions are at  once your own and those of Man.
To view me as an enemy is to  incur our Father's wrath. Man's  future rests in your hands.
choices: What are you trying to say?

chats: ...Now, allow me to ask this plainly.
Can you sacrifice yourself in order to demonstrate your adoration of our Father?
...Both your world and this world, everything is the creation of our omnipotent Father.
You, who reside in that world  of the almighty, what is it  that has beleaguered you so?
...You, who forgot our Father's authority and became a victim of the society built by impudent Man.
...Heed my words. I am not  the one you should detest.
choices: I'll be the judge of that.

chats: ...Yes, I shall be martyred here and the greatness of our Father will be spoken of for all time...
I fear neither death... nor you.
choices: Why are you telling me this?

chats: ...Allow me to speak to  you as a mature adult.
Out of respect for our Father,  let us take a moment's respite...
choices: What do you want to say?

chats: ...You have wounded me, an envoy of our Father. It is inevitable that calamity shall befall you.
...The least I can do is extend this small mercy. Confess the calamity that you can bear.
choices: I always manage to step in gum.

chats: ...By the way, it seems like there is some misunderstanding here.
That power, it originates from our Father. Thus, is it not reasonable to repay him for the favor?
...By the way, do you know the origin of life? Both you and  I were created by our Father.
That is to say, we are brothers. There is no reason for us to fight.
choices: Leave my parents out of this.

chats: I see now... and so I understand all that was done. Is this but a test?
You have appeared to test  my adoration of our Father. Yes, you are... the Tempter!
By the way, you are already  in possession of our Father's divine blessing.
What do you hope to accomplish  by injuring me further...?
choices: There's no end if I start.

chats: ...Think carefully. I am here because of your  desire for salvation.
To force me to prostrate myself upon the ground... Is there anything else so irrational?
...I want to make something  clear, so I will venture to  pose this question.
Do you... think me a charlatan?
...Ah, you plunge forward toward your own desires, with no regard for others, or even our Father?
It seems the Sons of Man have denounced the word of our Father.  Tell me, what worth have you found?
...Now that I think about it, it was peaceful here, until your arrival.
You have thrown this place into upheaval. What would you think if  I did the same to your world?
...Once, the world you  inhabit was called "Paradise."  What is it now?
Is it not a breeding ground  for impudent humans? How do  you view this world of yours?
...Hear me. I am the bearer  of Man's happiness, dispatched  to you by our Father.
To destroy me is to keep this happiness from Man. You are wise. You understand this, do you not?
choices: What are you trying to say?

chats: I was just passin' by, and you roughed me up real bad. Hey, what's yer deal?
Somethin' bad happen in yer  life or somethin', sonny?
...Y'know, up till now, I did whatever I wanted. I knew it was gonna catch up ta me someday.
If yer gonna kill me, do me  a solid and make it quick.
...I gotta say, you've been a pretty inconsiderate host. You oughta show more hospitality.
Couldn't you at least make me a cup of tea or somethin'? Hell, that'd be real polite.
You did a hell of a job cornerin' me like this.
...I gotta ask. How do you train?
choices: I just have a knack for it.

chats: So... Yer a student, right? Is it OK fer you ta just be hangin' around here like this?
Hey. Why aren't you at school?
...Hey. You never know if someone  you know might be watchin'.
A bad rep spreads like wildfire. If I were you, I'd quit all this nonsense. What's the point?
choices: I don't know any other way.

chats: Look, sonny. I... I've, uh, got this girl waitin' fer me.
...You know what I'm gettin' at, right? You think you could  let me go see my girl?
choices: What kind of girl is she?

chats: ...Yer really takin' this  to the extreme, huh?
Are all the kids these days doin' stuff like this?
choices: No, I thought this up myself.

chats: Maybe it's the generation gap, but I just can't get what yer deal is, sonny.
In the very end, what the hell  are you tryin' ta tell me?
...What, is it fun fer you or somethin' ta take on an old guy like me?
If you ask me, it's a lot more fun ta go chasin' after younger ladies, but...
...Geez. Looks like I ran into one crazy brat.
Hey. So whaddya think when you think about the future?
choices: I just want to enjoy the now.

chats: Hey. Yer kinda skinny, ain't you? These days, I hear even men go on diets too...
What do ya usually eat?
Hey. Are you treatin' me this way 'cause of the way I look?
What's wrong with the way I look, huh?
Adults can sorta do what they want, but they also gotta take responsibility fer what they do.
Don't take this the wrong way, but man... Bein' a carefree kid sure must be nice.
choices: I want to be a kid forever.
I wish I was still a baby.

chats: Y'know, in the human world, I hear that when people meet each other, it's called "fate."
What kinda "fate" do you think there is in this meetin' between me and you?
choices: I want to end this fate.

chats: Ah, well. It looks like my last moment in life finally snuck up on me...
Y'know, if I'm gonna be killed, I'd rather be offed by some beautiful, classy woman.
choices: You don't get to be picky.

chats: ...Ugh, this hurts.
Hey, if you got any medicine,  lend me some. They're supposed ta work miracles, right...?
...Hey. Everyone else says I'm  young, but I've lived much  longer than you have, sonny.
Know how they say, "Be kind ta yer elders"? Has no one ever taught you that?
choices: I don't want to grow old.

chats: Y'know, before I died, I wanted ta take a trip somewhere...
...How 'bout you, sonny? What kinda trip do you wanna take?
Ah, well. I'm gonna die, so I may as well do one last good deed.
Hey, sonny, if somethin's been botherin' you, I'm willin' ta give you a listen.
Y'know, let's just drop all this dangerous stuff and go fer a drink. Whaddya say?
Humans talk over drinks, right? How 'bout it? Hell,  let me buy you a round, sonny.
Kids these days, they'll just go out and kill anyone.
Man, I'm about ta be a victim of that too. Hell, does this country even have a future?
...Hey. Y'know, if you kill me, another "me" is just gonna take my place...
In the end, killin' me's just a waste of yer time and energy. You get what I'm sayin', right?
choices: When you put it that way...

chats: ...Hey. Won't you listen ta my dyin' request? I wanna have some of yer "hospitality."
What kinda "hospitality" will you show me at the end of my life?
choices: A coupon for a massage by me.
I'll quietly be at your side.

chats: So? What's this all about? Are you gonna give it to me?
If that's the plan, well, you better make sure I'm satisfied.
Look, let's just say that I  was in the wrong, all right? So won't you calm down already?
You know... If you're willing to let this go...  I'll make it worth your while.
*giggle* I guess I let my guard down. Can you blame me? I didn't expect you to be so strong...
...So? What's going to happen to me now?
choices: What do you want to happen?

chats: ...If I knew this was going to happen, it would have been nice if I learned to cook better, huh?
You know, if I were to whip something up for you,  what would you want?
...I'm just putting this out there, but you wouldn't treat me this way if I were younger, right?
...It's true, isn't it?
choices: Cougars are all the rage now.

chats: ...Hey, there's no need for all this, right? Let's drop the drama and just go get something to eat.
The thought has crossed your mind, hasn't it? Come on, where would you take me?
...Um, hey, you're still  a student, right?
So... You enjoy teasing older women like this?
...Is this OK? You standing here, being so close to me?
Wouldn't your girlfriend get jealous if she could see us?
choices: It's only bad if I get caught.

chats: ...OK, I understand  your feelings.
I lost. Here I lay, at your  feet, at your mercy. Just  what do you want from me?
I should hate being in this situation, but somehow, it's not all that bad.
The way you treat me, though, is giving me mixed messages. How do you really feel about me?
You know, the time I've spent  talking with you hasn't really  been all that bad.
I wonder how things might have been between us if circumstances were different somehow.
Ah, what am I going to do? Because we were fighting and everything, I lost track of time.
Well, I need to see  myself home soon...
...Oh, yes. I heard that human women often trick their lovers  into meeting their parents.
If your girlfriend asked if you were free to have dinner with her  "friends," what would you say?
...When human women take a vacation, they go on trips with their boyfriends, right?
I wanted to go on vacation, too, before all this happened...
...Oh yes. I'm sorry to ask at a time like this, but I'm interested in men's home cooking.
Do you have a dish you're good at?
I can't believe that I got led around this far by a man.
Is there a reason why I just can't beat you?
This is a bit sudden, but can I talk about something I heard about humans?
What do you think about  humans showing pictures  of their baby to others?
...I know now's not the time for this, but I think you're actually my type.
How about we live together? What kind of place do you want to live in?
...Um, do you really plan on shooting me?
I've heard that love can bloom anywhere, even on a battlefield. Don't you think that's possible?
At any rate, even I have to say this is a pitiful mess.
I wonder if it's about time I quit this job.
...I just realized this, but you're being very aggressive...
Could this be what you humans call a proposal...?
...Um, hey, I know things are what they are here, but could you let me go?
Today I have what you humans call a girl's night out.
...I understand. If I'm going to be killed, I want to make sure I have a beautiful end.
...So, I'm sorry, but can I go and fix my bangs first?
...This wasn't how it was  supposed to be... What  about my future...?
I was going to catch a great  guy, live a life of celebrity... Where'd it all go wrong?
I can't quite fathom why any of this is happening.
Care to explain yourself? I certainly hope you have a good reason for this boorish treatment.
choices: It'd take a while to explain.

chats: Excuse me, I believe this can be considered sexual harassment.
I insist you surrender yourself to the authorities.
Um... Can't you take a hint?
I've been sending you serious "don't speak to me" vibes.
choices: But we may never meet again...

chats: I must ask, was there something you desired of me?
I am inclined to turn you down, but if you still wish to speak, I will perhaps consider it.
Excuse me, why are you taking so much anger out on me?
What is irritating you so much?
It's frustrating when others bother me when I have things to do.
Won't you just leave me be?
I know it's odd to say this about myself, but... people who know me will say I never let things go.
...I'm not going to go easy on you for doing something like this, you know.
Allow me to ask you something...
Would you do to anyone else what you're doing to me now?
I've heard that human men have a proclivity to tease the women that interest them.
Is it not possible for this series of events involving you and me to be attributed to that?
No matter the crime, humans treat it more lightly if the perpetrator is a minor, do they not?
Ah, so I suppose you commit such extreme acts because you know you won't be punished harshly...
I don't mean to doubt you or anything, but would you mind if I ask you a question?
Is there really any benefit for me if I joined with you?
...If you think about it, there is no need to ask someone you've nearly killed to listen to you.
Don't you think expecting your would-be victim to be receptive to your words is unreasonable?
It frustrates me to think that my impending death here would be meaningless. And yet...
That may be because my life may also be meaningless. All I've known is the way of life here.
choices: There are other ways to live.

chats: ...For now, I suspect that you've decided to hear me out. Am I not right?
Why have you decided to be more communicative with me?
We were trying to kill each other just a short while ago. It's surprising if you think about it.
I wonder if us speaking together like this now means that we are somehow connected...
All this would never have happened if you had not come here.
I suppose this "real world" where you come from must be fairly boring.
Perhaps things look rather bleak for us at the moment, but...
You do understand that I'm here because people like you exist, right?
In any case, I have heard that young people today have poor communication skills.
You, however, are talking to me right here. Are you the exception to this rule?
You have teammates who would mourn you if something were to happen, do you not?
I also have loved ones who would miss me. You do catch my meaning, yes?
Truth be told, I don't entirely dislike my time spent with you. In fact... I may even be happy.
But is it fair to the others if I find this happiness, leaving them all in the dust?
...We are going to have to be on equal footing if we are to be together.
Tell me, what does "equality" mean to you?
If we joined together, that would mean that you become me, and I become you, yes?
I occasionally wish to pamper myself as a reward for working hard. How would you do that?
Perhaps it's odd to say this now, but I'm still unwilling to admit defeat.
That's how I feel. And is it not pitiable when one denies one's feelings to oneself?
Well, no matter how hard you try,  things won't work out between us  if there are no feelings.
Taking that into consideration, do you still want me?
Hey! That really hurt!
Ooh, what if this leaves a scar and it's permanent?
Why do you carry something like that with you, anyway?
You carry a gun because you think it'll make you more popular with the girls?
Hey. So this is assault, right?
...Maybe I'll call the police. Maybe I'll tell 'em that you were worse than you actually were!
...Don't tell me you're going to shoot that. You're not really gonna do that to me, are you?
Hey, how about this? If you don't shoot me, then I'll kiss you. Not a bad deal, right?
Hmmm? There's something about the way you smell... Oh, I see...
It's hard to tell under the mask, but... you're actually handsome, aren't you?
Ah! The hem on your long coat is really cute!
Are there only men's versions?  Where did you get it?
So... Is this it for me? But, I'm still so young.
Hey mister, if I grew up,  what do you think the future  me would've been like?
...Why me, though?
I'm sure there're other people in the world who'd irritate you more. You know, like--
choices: Older people trying to look young.

chats: All right, I get it. You didn't really mean to approach me, right?
When it came right down to it, you couldn't do anything to me!
choices: What do you want me to do?

chats: Anyway, I'm so angry right now. It looks like my fortune was right.
My horoscope said I was  gonna have "relationship  difficulties" today.
choices: How is your luck in romance?

chats: ...Hey. Aren't you hungry?
Can we take a break and go eat somewhere?
choices: What do you want to eat?

chats: Oh crap! Today's the day of the event! I hope tons of hotties show up.
What do you think I should wear? I admit it, I wanna draw some attention to myself.
Why are you so interested in me, anyway?
I'll go out with you just for today if there are no strings attached.
choices: I've got enough on my plate...

chats: You know, if you wanted to take me somewhere, I'll go with you.
It's no fun going home when only my annoying mom and dad are there.
...Ugh, this is getting to be a drag.
We'll just say you win. So can we stop this?
Oh, I totally forgot to reply  to my messages. It'd be a pain  if they get pissy about this...
Do you have a lot of friends? Ever feel like the things they do are annoying?
Hey, is this all a game to you?
You're lucky it was just me.  You can't do anything like this in the real world, right?
...I've been thinking. And I know it's stupid when I'm the one who has to say it...
You're hitting on me, right? Don't you think you're totally doing it wrong?
...Hey, so the reason why I'm here like this is because of humans, right?
If that's true, then I don't think there's any real point in killing me...
...Oh. Yeah... I didn't take a bath yesterday.
Hey, is my hair flat? Does it look weird?
...I'm getting bored of this.
I'll let you kill me, but I want you to do something fun for me before that.
...Oh yeah, so, I heard  that human idols have  these big auditions.
Honestly, aren't I, like, a way better girl than those idols?
...So, yeah, a lot of people have been telling me lately to grow up and act more mature or whatever.
Is it because I'm not acting mature enough? Like, what the heck makes someone mature, anyway?
...Ugh, if this were a movie, right about now, some dashing prince would come and save me.
Well, I'm still here. ...That guy is really keeping me waiting.
...Now that I've taken a good look at you, dearie, you're pretty young, even for a human.
You were so sure of yourself, so it's embarrassing now to admit you're struggling here. Right?
I know that saying this defeats the purpose of us talking, child, but...
Well, quite frankly... No one wants you here. You do understand that, right?
Oh, that's right. I hear that you humans have a holiday for celebrating the elderly.
I suppose that's why I feel so confused, child. After all, why am I being treated like this?
You're a human child, right? I'll try to say it in a way so that you can understand, dearie.
I wish I could see what kind of parents raised you to run loose and wreak havoc like this.
choices: Leave my parents out of this.

chats: ...In any case, dear, why are you wandering around here?
You must be one of those delinquents I hear about. Do you have poor grades in school?
My goodness, you're a strange child. It's clear that you want to spend time with an old biddy like me.
But I've been around the block, so I know--there's something else you want from me, isn't there?
choices: I just want you to die happy.

chats: ...I never thought someone like me would ever be outdone by some human.
When I was young, I could make anyone back off--if they were smart enough--with just my glare.
I know you're taking the trouble to talk to me, dearie, but I think young humans are the worst.
Oh, they're so self-assured that they'll be so successful in the future. Are you like that, child?
Explain something to me, dearie. You have a pretty good life in the real world, don't you?
Why did you come to this dangerous place? Isn't it much safer in the real world?
choices: There are things I must do.

chats: This old woman just has to ask out of concern. Don't you have things to do in the real world?
You'll have a bleak future if you spend too much time running around pretending to be a phantom thief.
Now, dearie, if I've got this straight, you're asking me to leave this place and become one with you.
Isn't that just like when a human woman gets married and moves in with her husband?
...Oh, right. In your real world, you call elderly women "granny," don't you?
I'm thinking that maybe I should act more grandmotherly. How can I go ahead and do that for you?
You know, dearie, I'm hearing that divorce after a long marriage is a popular fad in the real world.
I guess women are really more social these days, finding so many fun things to do outside the home.
g TalkMsg_GUY_CH
choices: I don't really think about it.

chats: ...You know, dearie, I hear some humans take pleasure in playing pranks on the elderly.
After confronting me like this... Are you that kind of human too?
You know, dearie, humans sure like to poke fun at the elderly.
I wish they would leave us old people alone. After all, it's not like we have much time left.
Oh, I wanted to ask you, dearie. There's something I heard about riding trains in the real world...
Some old people refuse to make use of special seats reserved for the elderly. What do you think of that?
I've been hearing that more of the elderly are dying alone, and it's becoming a problem in your world.
I think dying alone isn't so bad, dearie, but isn't living alone in the first place the real tragedy?
I've been wanting to ask a young person like you about the clothes young women wear these days...
They wear sleeveless shirts in the winter, right? What do you think about that, dearie?
...Now that I think about it, you're the one who approached me. Isn't that right, dearie?
You were the first one to show any interest, so I think you should say something to make me happy.
choices: Don't be so full of yourself.

chats: You know, dearie, I don't think people say "hepcat" or "that's smooooth music" anymore.
Don't you think it's sad that slang and sayings can grow old and get outdated?
You know, dearie, I've been meaning to ask... Humans do things called "reunions," no?
Would you be willing to spend time and money to see people you haven't contacted for years?
Oh, times are tough in the real world, too. I hear your economy's been doing pretty badly, dearie...
Something about people putting honey on cucumbers to feel like they're eating fancy cantaloupe...?
When I think about it... I have no family, and I don't have much time left...
I suppose it makes no difference if you kill me or if I die just a little bit later, dearie.
I know what this is... My mom was talking about it the other day.
This is that "domestic violins" thing, right?
choices: Um, are things OK at home?

chats: Hey, uh, so you know I'm just a little kid, right?
You're s'posed to go easy on kids! Are you stupid? Do you go to school and get stupid grades?
I can't believe you're fighting a kid like me... Pick on someone your own size!
You're a big bully! Don't you think that's "immature"?
Oh, yeeeah! I wanted to ask you, mister, 'cause maybe you know why...
It looks boring to me, so how come grown-ups like kissy facing? Why do they like "making out"?
Oh yeah, isn't it almost "supper"?
Hey, let's play a game! Guess what I wanna eat!
So, humans like to have "bedtime stories," right?
Guess what I want you to read to me before you tuck me into bed!
Oh, I wanted to ask you something. You ready?
When you were little, what did you wanna be when you grow up?
Oh, yeah. Maybe you know!
Where do babies come from?
Hey, how come you keep coming here? I wanna know.
Aren't people as old as you s'posed to go "dating," all the time? Can't you get some dates?
Oh, hey, listen to me. I think being a kid is really hard.
Didn't you feel like that when you were a kid, too?
...Oh, yeahhh. I never asked you about this. This one is a super important question.
When you eat curry, mister, what do you like to add?
...Awww man, I didn't get to eat my snack yet today.
Hey, mister, will you gimme a yummy snack to eat?
...Oh, in the mail, I got a letter with my name on it, but it was from someone I don't know.
What was that, anyway?
Oh, yeah! Hey, mister, you know when grown-ups say kids are cute?
Do you think they really mean it all the time?
choices: No, but they say it anyway.

chats: ...Hey, mister. So what're you doing here, anyway?
Are you bored?
...Hey, play with me! You're already here, so c'mon!
What are we gonna do, huh?
...Hey, why'd you do this to me?
Is it 'cause I wasn't a "good boy"?
...Oh, yeah. So, why are you fighting, anyway, mister?
Are you fighting to help or protect the world or something?
Oh yeah! I heard human kids cry when they hafta go to the doctor and get their shots.
Is it scary to get a shot? Does it make you cry, mister?
Awww man, I'm tired...
I'm tired of being a kid. Didn't you feel that way when you were little, too?
choices: I want to be a kid forever.

chats: Hey... We're not friends, are we?
I think the way you're treating me is "overfamiliar." I think...
Oh, hey. Did you know that I get really scary when I get mad?
Is it OK if I get mad right now?
...Hey. Are you allowed to hit other people's kids like this?
Maybe kids got spanked a long time ago, but people don't do that anymore, right?
Oh, listen! I went shopping with my mom the other day.
She said, "I'll buy it for you on the way home," but she didn't buy it for me! Isn't that not fair?
...Me not make excuses. Me lost, so me pay consequences.
Me am really in soup, now. Do what you want. Me am ready if you want grill me, so...
choices: OK, I'll make you into soup.

chats: ...Human, you dumb. This territory ours.
Why you keep trampling here? What you humans thinking?
Me not understand... How did human outsmart me?
Me not understand in what way you superior to me...
...Me thought you not from around here. You human?
Why you come all the way here?
Me hear that, in your world, big groups protect animals. They protect animal rights.
You not worry you get in trouble if those groups hear what you are doing to me?
...After me look closer, me can see you really young human. You not even alive that many years.
Why you fight and put yourself in harm's way?
Me understand now not time to bring this up, but... me really hungry.
Me really want to eat something.
Hmm... Me not can see your true intentions because mask cover face.
What you thinking now?
choices: I need a new cell phone.
I want girls to like me.

chats: ...Young human, me see you make effort to talk to me.
There something you want say to me, right?
...Humans not seem satisfied to only capture beasts. Me know you use us for other reasons too.
If you capture me, what you going to do to me?
choices: Eat you in a hot pot.
You'll be my new stylish coat.

chats: ...Hey, human. You look really young. You still at age when you depend on others, huh?
You go back to your mother's arms. You need take nap now.
choices: Mom will wait till I'm done.

chats: ...The more me look at your mask, the more strange it look.
Why you wear mask to fight, anyway?
choices: It keeps my foes' blood off.
That's what I want to know.

chats: Since ancient times, humans  feared and respected gods and spirits...
So why me in this situation right now? Why me at your mercy?
Me know humans take joy in raising descendants, your future generation. So me have to ask...
You given much thought, what if you go to place where you could die at any moment?
...So, what me hear is, some humans care for beasts like own family.
Why you not care for me like that? Why you treat  me like this, then?
Me having hard time to accept that human like you is more stronger than me.
Me guessing you have power that me not have. But what is it...?
Me wish me could eat human food once before me die...
Me want to ask some  recommendations, so me can at least imagine.
choices: Ice cream off the carton lid.

chats: Your victory pretty much assured, so me want to ask deep question.
You have wishes you not can let go of, even after you die?
Me am frustrated, but me am going to die soon. You are my strongest rival, but also my friend...
Me want you to give me some nice "words of compassion"--as my rival--as me pass away...!
choices: Why show mercy to my enemy?

chats: ...From what me hear, humans use "lies" to trick and deceive others all the time.
It look like you corner me... But how me know this not trick? How me know you really winning?
...Me admit it. Me afraid of dying now, all of sudden. You can laugh at me if you want.
You had something you lost, and you not know how important it was until after it gone, right?
...You come here because you ordered to, right? Humans always slaves to rules and order.
Me not curse you, but me curse  your commander! Me curse the  one who order you...!
...Fine. Maybe you kill me, but me dying have lasting impact on you. Make you better human.
So me am going to haunt you for the rest of your life. Me always right behind you...
...Just so me clear, even if you defeat me, another assassin just target you.
You better enjoy and be drunk on victory while you can. It not last long.
...This again? This is getting to be-hee-come kind of a hassle, ho.
Humans always want either an autograph or a self-hee, ho. Which is it, ho?
...You don't think you'll get away with this scot-free, do you, ho?
I'm a super popular Shadow, you know. My fans won't just sit around and take this, ho.
What do you want with me, ho? Hee-ohhh, now I know...
...You've come from some other company to scout me-hee out. There's no mistaking it, ho!
choices: I've come to finish you off.

chats: ...Hee-ho! Are you trying to kill me so you can take my place as cute mascot?
You know, a mascot's life isn't hee-easy. Are you sure you could handle all the adversity, ho?
...You know, I have my own life too. Even a guy like me needs some privacy, ho!
Sorry, but I want you to go hee-home now. I'm already feeling so tired and weary, ho...
I can't hee-hold out any longer. I usually put on a smile, but...
You'll probably break down in tears when you see my angry face. I'm a real monstrosity, ho!
choices: I want to see your fury.

chats: ...Hee-ho, are you here to interrogate me?
Have you made an appointment, ho?
choices: Just tell me what you know.

chats: ...You know, I haven't seen you around here before.
You new? Did you just get hee-hired, ho?
...Um, can I go now, ho?
I'm busy, ho. It's tough being so popular.
Assuming--but let's be honest, I'm a hee-hundred percent sure--you came all the way here to see me...
How did you find out about me, ho?
Ah, I've been holding back on you...
But I've got a catch phrase that I'm famous for.
...Oh yeah! I'm off after this. If I survive, I'll go out to eat somewhere, ho!
Where should I go? I want something yummy, ho!
...That's hee-nough. I knew from the very start.
This is all some kind of thing for TV, ho! Where's the camera?
...Being as cool as I am, I've become public property, ho.
I can't sadden my fans, ho. ...You catch my drift, don't you?
...In any case, I just don't understand, ho.
How did I lose to you? I mean... I win when it comes to looks, ho.
I'm so busy... I've been awake since yesterday, ho.
I'm so sleepy, ho! I just want you to leave me alone...
...Hee-hey, you don't think I just speak like a dummy, do you, ho?
To tell you the hee-truth, this is all an act, ho. What do you think I'm really like, ho?
*sigh* I'm tired of the endless fighting, ho...
I need to recover, ho. Don't you feel that way too...?
...Hee-ho! Could it be... you want to be my apprentice, ho?
You're showing off your strength to me, aren't you? I total-hee read your mind, ho.
I just realized... Did I lose because I'm getting boring? Does my act need more novelty, ho?
Maybe I should try something new! I don't want to fall into mediocrity, ho...
choices: Your act is a bit stale...

chats: ...You know what? I've had hee-nough of this hee-horrible treatment. It's an indignity, ho!
How can you do such terrible things to a cute hee-ho like me!?
...What did I ever do to you, anyway? Why all the hate, ho?
I guess I'm asking if you've got a good re-hee-son for treating me so badly, ho.
choices: It's a means to an end.

chats: ...Come to think of it, I've been feeling strange, ho...
My chest is beating so fast... What is this feeling...?
...Hee-how can I face my fans? I look so pathetic now. It's a major blow to my hee-go...
My only choice now... is to retire, ho.
